website_summaries.verdict: Cleans nicely without requiring a lot of elbow grease, but it is a little pricey.
pros: Provides a bit of coating over the stainless steel item, helping protect it from water spots in the future
Works on other common surfaces in the kitchen, including fiberglass, enamel, or plastic
Cleans without a lot of effort
cons: Seems to leave streaks on the surface
Odor may be too harsh for some people

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS awesome but smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Sheila Shine 461216 Stainless Steel Cleaner and Polish, 10 oz. arrived on time and packaging was good. I stumbled across this at a local yard sale and it has to be the BEST stainless steel cleaner and polish I have ever used. This product WORKS. It gets off any and all fingerprints & dust/dirt. I suggest using a microfiber cloth with the product. Also, when cleaning go with the grain of the stainless. Great price for the results! The can lasts a long time. The only downfall is the awful smell. It’s really strong and painful to inhale. I recommend this product if you want a clean streak free stainless appliance but be prepared for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Davina

customer_reviews.title: Beware, contains PERCHLOROETHYLENE which is known to cause cancer and smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product contains PERCHLOROETHYLENE, a solvent that is being phased out of dry cleaning because it is so toxic and causes cancer. My entire house smells like a chemical factory right now -- all the windows and doors are opened. Yes, my stainless steel is shiny, but never using this product again. Can't recommend. Stay safe, everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Goldengate

customer_reviews.title: Leaves stainless steel like new!
customer_reviews.text: My apartment used to have someone living in it and when I did my clean out to transfer, I couldn’t clean the fridge correctly. I tried the stainless steel wipes, I tried diy hacks (and hacks they are! They only made it WORSE!). I ended up asking the apartment manager what did the cleaning team use and this is it. I tried it and man... this will leave your products so clean, it looks like you JUST bought them. Like everyone else says, a little goes a looooooong way so use less than you think you would need.
customer_reviews.author: future prettycommittee!

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye, Fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: While thrilled with my new stainless steel fridge, I was frustrated with having to clean off fingerprints daily. A friend who owns a restaurant/bar recommended Sheila Shine, which was an excellent tip. Yes, it stinks when first sprayed, but the smell dissipates quickly. It's quick and easy to apply. It repels fingerprints, and those that do appear are easily wiped off. I'm planning to try the wax form of Sheila Shine next to form a protected base since I've heard that it's even better. Then a simple swipe with the spray will keep it clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lively

customer_reviews.title: Best stainless cleaner for consumer use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! There is no comparison between this brand and the usual cleaning section offerings. This small can will not only outlast other brands, but it keeps stainless almost smudge free. A little goes a long way. If a handprint shows up I just wipe dry with paper towel. This brand was highly recommended by appliance salesroom.
customer_reviews.author: Happiernow

customer_reviews.title: Best Stainless Cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: Sheila Shine is the best stainless steel cleaner out there. I've used tons of products (QVC, Target, Bed Bath & Beyond, etc.) I had hard water stains on my dishwasher and this product took the stains out .Nothing else worked. It gives all of your stainless steel a great shine and really cleans. You only need to use a small amount and use a very soft cloth to apply.
customer_reviews.author: LLEE

customer_reviews.title: The BEST product to clean, polish and protect stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best SS cleaner and polish i have ever used. Beats all other options I have tried. Like the wintergreen smell, and how it gets gunk of my BBQ that other stuff won't, and it leaves a smooth protective coating that seems to repel dust and water. I always have a can or two around the house or for my outside cooking area
customer_reviews.author: Alan Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Superb product, but mist is too fine
customer_reviews.text: Performance does not get better than this. It's the only such product I will use. That said, I definitely walk outside to spray it onto the cloth, as the mist is very fine and there is no way to avoid breathing it if you spray inside. It has a solvent-y odor which lingers a bit after application, even if you spray outside. Still, the job is does cannot be surpassed. A little goes a long way. 5 stars for performance, minus 1 star for solventyness.
customer_reviews.author: EspressoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works but Smells Awful
customer_reviews.text: It works well to remove fingerprints and water spots. However, it does not clean off dried milk splatter or any liquid that contains sugar. I had to work hard on those areas. I hope the protective layer helps in the future. It smells awful, but it doesn't streak. Use a microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. Definitely spray it on the cloth or paper towel. Then wipe it on your stainless and see all the prints and stains vanish. Used it on my stove, and dishwasher. They look like brains new. The smell is something to get used to. Do not spray it directly on the appliance. Fallow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my stainless steel fridge and dishwasher much cleaner and free from smudges as I was shocked to find out how bad they can get when I bought my stainless steel appliances. The only thing is that it has a very potent smell when you use it, but it does go away quickly enough. You just would not want to use it before company arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had really high hopes for this product but sadly it wasn't all that great...
customer_reviews.text: People really rave about this one but I just didn't think it was anything special...also it really made my tile floors slippery in front of the fridge following application & it was difficult to get clean which was a bit of a safety concern.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Lynn

customer_reviews.title: the holy grail of stainless steel cleaners
customer_reviews.text: They stopped carrying this in my local market, so I tried three other brands foolishly thinking THEY'RE ALL THE SAME, RIGHT? No. No they are not. Sheila Shine is like mom-spit: it's a magical, miraculous fix-it liquid you could maybe live without but you certainly wouldn't want to.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: I liked mine so much, I ordered one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My housecleaner introduced me to Sheila Shine and I ordered some to use in between her visits. I liked mine so much, I ordered it for my daughter who also has stainless steel in her kitchen. Very easy to use. Spray on cloth and wipe down!
customer_reviews.author: vabeach42

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: Shelia Shine works OK, but it does not clean my stainless steel frig door all that well. With kids opening the door all the time, there invariably are mystery liquids that get on the door that slide all the way down to the bottom, leaving marks that Shelia Shine just won't clear up. If you are working with a mildly dirty stainless item, it will make it look very attractive. If you have some tough stains, it just covers them up a little, but they are still visible. I'll keep the Shelia Shine, but I am still in the market for something stronger. While the product was not up to expectations, the delivery time most certainly was.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Shelia Shine was recommended to me by the men that delivered and installed my new stainless refrigerator. It truly is remarkable... Better then any other product for cleaning your stainless appliances. A little goes a long way, application was/is easy. Use a 100 percent cotton pillow case to gently buff out the extra product going into the direction of the grain so it is even all over. It also lasts longer then other products as far as finger prints are concerned... This is inenvitable with all stainless no matter how hard you try to keep them away. Highly recommend Shelia Shine❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: My Gutters look great!
customer_reviews.text: I have stainless Steele gutters. Which look great, but ned constant maintenance. Sheila Shine has made my life so much easier. My gutters really pop, and now my houses value has increased in value!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was used at my workplace in a hospital to add shine surfaces after cleaning. No slick residue. I use it on my kitchen appliances and some dull spots in the bathtub. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY stainless steel product that really works without driving my batty. I'm a little on the OCD side and I like my stainless steel to shine all the time. When we moved in to our new house, the owner left us a can of Sheila Shine and thank God she did. Nothing else works as well. Use two rags, one to apply (slightly damp) and one to wipe, start at the top and work your way down. Voila, it works like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Queen de Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, cleans great, I go back and forth between wd40 and Sheila shine for stainless steel cleanning. Be sure to spray your cleanning rag, not directly on appliance
customer_reviews.author: ROSSANA  VELECICO

customer_reviews.title: A product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried so many products to clean my stainless steel appliances and never had one that cleans like this! Was introduced to it by a guy who cleans up houses after construction is finished. The only complaint is that if I just try to wipe a small spot, it shows, so you pretty much have to wipe down the whole appliance at the same time. But it goes quickly and looks so good I don't mind. Strong fumes, so you might want to wear a mask.
customer_reviews.author: janlor

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling Shine
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Shines up anything Stainless Steel. Great to use on Kitchen Sink and BBQ grill. A little does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JBG

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great for stainless steel appliances/sink. Strong smell but does a good job. Easier to use than other products. Ordered it when I saw clean up crew at our boat club using it on exterior railings.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for master custodian's
customer_reviews.text: Not much is needed to spray on cloth so less is definitely more in that case. Product odor is very strong. With oil based chemicals watch were you spray, residue will sit around on floor, walls, etc. Product gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Darius T

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This stuff shined my stainless kitchen appliances up in no time. Definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't found a SS cleaner that really is exceptional but this is very good.
customer_reviews.author: davidpnola

customer_reviews.title: The Best Stainless Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but after using this a few times, it is by far the best stainless cleaner/shiner around, and I have tried many. A little goes a long way around the kitchen. The only small drawback, is the smell - not that great, but thankfully does not linger either.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: KP
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product to clean stainless steel appliances. I have a kitchen full of them. I use a microfiber towel and spray the towel gently. If you wipe down you will have a clean appliance. I use it on my stainless steel stove hood, wall ovens, fridge, dishwasher, faucet, cabinet handles, etc. Anything stuck on, use soap and water or windex first then use the microfiber towel with the spray on it. Outstanding. The next time you clean it you might not even need anymore until the next time after that!!! It's good stuff. A little potent in odor so don't sniff it...but it is clean and really works great.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This does not work well at all on my refrigerator, ovens, or dishwasher, I got it to clean and shine my stainless appliances and it left an ugly streaking and foggy look. What worked was a special microfiber stainless steel cloth and a little Simple Green
customer_reviews.author: Danette Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Say Goodbye to Fingerprints on your Stainless Steel Appliances
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and fingerprints are a thing of the past. Also, we thought the item had not been delivered (it was) and had communications with the company. They wanted a good customer experience and were honest and quick and professional in their responses. The one downside is that this product has a very strong chemical smell. Use with decent ventilation or prepare to leave the room for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have several stainless steel appliances and, as others have said, Sheila Shine does a great job of removing fingerprints. What I especially like is that it removes stains from the stove top. Sometimes when foods such as tomato sauce splash on the stove top, a slight discoloration remains on the stainless steel even after I do a through job of cleaning up. One wipe of the rag with Sheila Shine and the spot is gone leaving the stove top looking like new. I have a rag that I use exclusively for the Sheila Shine and never wash. The rag absorbs the product and can be reused repeatedly before adding more Sheila Shine to it. Makes it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: MHB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have cleaned houses for 25+ years. This is the best stainless steel cleaner that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It really shines stainless steel appliances nicely. Only a small amount of product is needed. I would recommend spraying on a cloth instead of directly on appliances though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Dudley

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing short of AMAZING. Yes it has a strong smell but it disappears quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HLM

customer_reviews.title: Anything stainless sink’s dishwashers and microwaves and refrigerators the best there is
customer_reviews.text: Best Best stainless steel cleaner on the market without question.
customer_reviews.author: Highly recommended NSXED

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years. Absolutely the best product for Stainless steel!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm, but toxic
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended as the only way to eliminate smudges and smears from my Miele dishwasher's stainless finish. It's the only stainless finish in my kitchen which doesn't work with milder substances. Sheila Shine works like a charm, but it is extremely toxic, and a little goes a long way. Open the windows or have some circulation of air to use this product. It is effective, but I'm going to continue to look for other products that might work as well with fewer environmental consequences.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni M. Faust

customer_reviews.title: What a shine!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I’ve used stainless cleaners before but none have made my stainless appliances shine like this !! Easy to use and a little goes a long ways.
customer_reviews.author: Tlw

customer_reviews.title: the BEST there is
customer_reviews.text: The BEST stainless cleaner there is. I have tried everyone within 50 miles of my house and they were all terrible. I ordered this one and my stainless has never looked better. I will never use another stainless cleaner again, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe the odor is bad and the cleaning ability to remove oil and smears ...
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed some people complain about the odor. One even said they preferred WD40 which also by the way has an odor. I don't believe the odor is bad and the cleaning ability to remove oil and smears is unbelievable. You cannot use WD40 in a commercial kitchen. This product really works at removing all markings including oil and hand stains. I wish I had known of this product when working as a janitor. If ;you have doubts, buy it and try it. I promise you that you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Zinser

customer_reviews.title: Want a Shiny Stainless Sink?
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my stainless kitchen sink. Makes it shine and look like new every time. Does have a little odor but the shine is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LIsa O

customer_reviews.title: Something changed! Now smells like paint thinner.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed... This product used to have a clean/pleasant scent (maybe spearmint/wintergreen). Now it just smells like paint thinner. They've obviously changed something. I used this product faithfully in my cleaning business but will be looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: TR30A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I have found for stainless steel. And it gets better as you use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stainless steel cleaner and polisher ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Em

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stainless Steel And...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for cleaning and renewing anodized aluminum on boats etc. Try it out it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: cberry2

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this product. Stainless appliances look new! A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Frank DeOrio

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: The only stainless steel clean and polish that I have used that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rao

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other stainless cleaners but they did not do the job. This works extremely well. Just need to use a little on the towel.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Hollander

customer_reviews.title: This stuff was recommended to me by a friend
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel appliances are so hard to keep shiny. This stuff was recommended to me by a friend. I bought it and now I know it's the best to clean stainless steel. I went throughout the house anything stainless got sprayed and everything is so shiny now. Better than the stainless steel clean sold at Home Depot. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanivan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It doesn’t take much to do the job. Use as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Skyking

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for stainless
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Try it, you’ll be a fan too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Twilley

customer_reviews.title: Best stainless polish I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago when I built my house I decided to go for all stainless appliances. Bad move. They showed every fingerprint, required constant attention. I literally must have tried about 8 different cleaning & polishing products. Most took a lot of effort to get it to look even. Few really addressed the fingerprint issue. None prevented further prints. Then I tried Sheila Shine. It was easy to use, wiped off readily with no streaking and actually seems to help prevent further finger prints. I'm cleaning the stainless FAR less often. More time for golf!
customer_reviews.author: Alan G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Overrated, overpriced and leaves a film on SS and has a toxic smell. Defiantly will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kidrick

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: Only product out of tons I tried that actually instantly shine my stainless appliances. This is my secret to a quick shine. Hope my review helps others who are frustrated with other stainless steel cleaners that don't perform well.
customer_reviews.author: GlanzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great for refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: really good on large stainless surfaces like refrigerator. I always have fingerprints on it and this does not show most fingerprints. It does show some greasy prints, but not the usual fingers without grease. Easy to spray on and wipe off --use a clean soft cloth to polish.
customer_reviews.author: Freia  Hooper-Bradford

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, makes my stainless sink shine. One thing that it claims to do is remove light scratches. Didn't work on my very light ones. I tried a few times and they're still there. There is a strong odor to SS, but as long as it works it's fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Sheila Shine arrived quickly and was as described by seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It leaves a cloudy residue and now my brand new refrigerator looks awful. I bought it after an appliance company recommended it. Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried em all!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NO SMUDGES after it’s dry, (every other product I’ve tried looks smudged once it’s dry). I’ve ordered 3 more to keep on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST Stainless Shine Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST product I've ever used on stainless appliances. Follow the directions and shine in the direction of the stainless grain and you will have perfect results. The ONLY product you will purchase once you've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Trish

customer_reviews.title: A must to have
customer_reviews.text: The best stainless steel cleaner on the market. Tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Rezvani

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It works well..the smell upon putting it on is powerful, but it fades and is good later on, not noticeable. It does cover scratches well and marks. it was recommended to me by an RV repair person who uses it all the time on all his stainless.
customer_reviews.author: patricia l. peterson

customer_reviews.title: Sheila Shine lives up to it high ratings.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe the reviews but it's true It works wonders. Kitchen looks awesome and my cleaning gal is happy because its so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! By far the best!! Will only use this. Does have a odor but worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: j.b.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for keeping stainless steel appliances clean & finger print free.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great clean - strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Works great and lasts of days but has a serious luck strong chemical smell - like paint thinner!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any stainless steel (but I clean a lot of other people's), so I tried it on my chrome toaster. The crud just wiped right off, it's super shines (like new), and I love that it also protects against future grime so it cleans up easier than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wyngarden

customer_reviews.title: Best SS cleaner I ever used
customer_reviews.text: All other products I've tried look like smear on my SS appliances. Shelia Shine was recommended by the appliance repairman. Great product. Will buy again and strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Been using on appliances for over a year can use paper towel
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm on this Whirlpool dishwasher with a stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm on this Whirlpool dishwasher with a stainless steel finish that previously was impossible to keep clean. Before this product, the dishwasher always got tons of fingerprints and spots. Now it gets clean as a whistle every time I bust out the Sheila Shine.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Pellerin

customer_reviews.title: Only sold on line.
customer_reviews.text: Used by stores that sell stainless steel appliances. The delivery man told me about it. Don’t use on appliances that have a protective coating .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product.... I can't believe I didn't learn about it sooner!

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST stainless steel cleaner ever! Five and a half years ago, we redid our kitchen and went with stainless steel appliances. We were given samples of stainless steel cleaners. They did not work. We bought others we had read about, they did not work. Then, someone advised using Pledge multi-surface. It was quite good, but still far from ideal. Then I read about Sheila Shine and decided to try it. Bingo! What a difference. I works like a charm and I will never be without it as long as I have stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Best Stainless Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. For anyone with stainless it is a must. I use it on other metal finishes too.

customer_reviews.text: Best Stainless Steel cleaner on the market. I have tried many brands, but Sheila works the best.

customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that actually cleans the stainless steel refrigerator easily quickly no Work no fuss

customer_reviews.text: I will never use anything else now after finding Shelia Shine, we love it.

But the fumes are wicked, you really do need to open a window and turn on an exhaust fan if using inside a dwelling.

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well, but seems rather toxic. I ...

product_meta.title: Sheila Shine 461216 Stainless Steel Cleaner and Polish, 10 oz.
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Removes greasy film and water marks. Resists fingerprints and streaking. Repels water; preserves surface against deterioration. Requires no rubbing or polishing. Also works on Formica, porcelain, fiberglass, enamel and plastic.
